featureImplementations.implementation: Create separate URL routes (/fr, /de, /it, /en) with French as default based on postal code 3965 (Romandie region). Use i18n JSON files for translations.
Show modal on page load with localStorage check to prevent re-showing after dismissal. Contains draft preview warning text and dismiss button.
Download logo from provided URL and store in assets directory. Use as both header logo and favicon. Ensure proper sizing for both use cases.
Set meta title to 'Lola Institut | Chippis', description summarizing beauty services, Open Graph tags for social sharing, and lang attribute based on selected language.
Mobile-first approach with breakpoints at 640px, 768px, 1024px. Hamburger menu on mobile, stacked sections, and touch-friendly buttons.
Embed Google Maps or OpenStreetMap iframe centered on coordinates 46.279334, 7.5422 with marker at salon address.
Phone number as tel: link, email as mailto: link for easy mobile interaction. No contact form per requirements.

additionalNotes: Lola Institut is a beauty salon (institut de beaut√©) in Chippis, Switzerland. The design should evoke elegance, warmth, and professionalism appropriate for a personal care business. Color palette uses warm, soft tones (golds, creams, warm browns) to create a luxurious yet welcoming atmosphere. Typography pairs elegant serif headings (Playfair Display) with clean sans-serif body text (Lato) for readability. The single-page layout ensures easy navigation on all devices. French is the primary language given the Romandie location (postal code 3965). No emojis should be used despite any in the source content. Images should be downloaded locally rather than hotlinked.
